subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
Basketball
Mascots
lead_paragraph: It is not only players under pressure this weekend as the regional rounds determine next weekend’s Final Four. The N.C.A.A. is straight-laced about many things, including mascot behavior.
snippet: It is not only players under pressure this weekend as the regional rounds determine next weekend’s Final Four. The N.C.A.A. is straight-laced about many things, including mascot behavior.
